Today's market dynamics reveal interesting patterns for sophisticated investors:

ЁЯФН Key Observations:
тАв IT sector (+1.85%) breaking out of consolidation
тАв Banking (-0.45%) creating accumulation zones
тАв Realty (+3.20%) - strongest sectoral performer
тАв VIX below 15 - low volatility environment

ЁЯУИ Technical Analysis:
Nifty50 at 25,438 has broken above 200-DMA with volume confirmation. Next resistance at 25,800. Support zone: 25,100-25,200.

ЁЯТ╝ Portfolio Strategy for UHNI/Corporate Clients:

1. Core Holdings (60%):
